tool_description: Parses and validates Certificate Signing Request (CSR) files, extracting subject information, public key details, and requested extensions for further processing.

csr_data.description: Base64-encoded CSR in PEM or DER format

error_messages: Invalid CSR format: Ensure CSR is properly Base64-encoded and in valid PEM or DER format.
Malformed CSR structure: CSR must contain valid subject information and public key.
Unsupported key algorithm: Only RSA, ECDSA, and EdDSA keys are supported.
Invalid CSR signature: CSR signature verification failed, ensure private key matches public key.
usage: Provide csr_data as Base64-encoded string and optionally specify format. Tool will parse and extract all relevant information from the CSR.

subject_dn.description: Distinguished name of the certificate subject

public_key_algorithm.description: Algorithm used for the public key (RSA, ECDSA, EdDSA)

key_size.description: Size of the public key in bits

requested_extensions.description: List of X.509 extensions requested in the CSR
